solution_line_template: Then Boris has a total of {boris_initial_books} - {boris_donated_books} = <<{boris_initial_books}-{boris_donated_books}={boris_remaining_books}>>{boris_remaining_books} books
Then Cameron has a total of {cameron_initial_books} - {cameron_donated_books} = <<{cameron_initial_books}-{cameron_donated_books}={cameron_remaining_books}>>{cameron_remaining_books} books
Altogether, Boris and Cameron have {boris_remaining_books} + {cameron_remaining_books} = <<{boris_remaining_books}+{cameron_remaining_books}={total_books_remaining}>>{total_books_remaining} books
